org.forgerock.openam.authentication.service.protocol

Class RemoteCookie

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.forgerock.openam.authentication.service.protocol.RemoteCookie
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class RemoteCookie
extends Object
implements Serializable
    Encapsulates a Cookie making it Serializable.
    Author:
    Steve Ferris steve.ferris@forgerock.com
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
